A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was very well done. Don't listen to the negative comments. Those are from people who wanted the story to go in a different direction than it did. They had high expectations in their minds at what SHOULD happen instead of what did. The Movie is ultimately about letting go of the past to create a new future\, which in truth\, is perfectly done. Don't pass this movie up. It's well worth going. And remember\, everybody hated Empire when it came out. It wasn't until many years later\, after Return\, that everybody realized what a masterpiece it was. The same will happen here.
